summary: Provides a PyTorch module that transforms batched YUV420 image tensors into RGB tensors, applying BT.470-5 conversion coefficients, upsampling chroma components, and enforcing even height and width constraints.
business_intent: Facilitates integration of video or camera data in YUV420 format into RGB‑based computer‑vision, graphics, or deep‑learning workflows by delivering a ready‑to‑use color‑space conversion step.
